name: Tech Career Fair 2025
description: Join us for an exciting career fair featuring top tech companies from around the region. Network with recruiters, learn about opportunities, and prepare for your future career.

name: Software Engineering Workshop
description: Hands-on workshop covering modern software development practices, including agile methodologies, CI/CD, and cloud deployment strategies.

name: Data Science Summit
description: Explore the latest trends in data science and machine learning. Industry experts will share insights on AI applications and career paths.

name: Startup Pitch Night
description: Watch aspiring entrepreneurs pitch their innovative ideas to a panel of investors and industry leaders. Great networking opportunity!

name: UX Design Masterclass
description: Learn from industry-leading UX designers about creating user-centered products. Includes portfolio review sessions and design challenges.
